4 days Bitch!!!! #BreakingBad

— Aaron Paul (@aaronpaul_8) August 7, 2013

— Masked Scheduler (@maskedscheduler) August 7, 2013

Hey, know what reduces the amount of press tour "Twitter snark"? Shows that aren't terrible. Want nicer comments? Make better shows. #tcas13

Charlie Rose takes TWO naps a day. [This is the kind of substantive tweet the LA Times story ignores.] #TCAs13 #PBS

— Daniel Fienberg (@TheFienPrint) August 7, 2013

Charlie Rose just said "curating and aggregating." Charlie Rose! #tcas13

— Linda Holmes (@nprmonkeysee) August 7, 2013

Seeing Charlie Rose without tie and with top buttons of his shirt undone is a little like seeing your father in a bathing suit. #pbs #tcas13

— Roger Catlin (@rcatlin) August 7, 2013

It's hard to imagine a more depressing experience than watching an episode of Maury.

— AllYourScreens Rick (@aysrick) August 7, 2013

Today is the day Marty McFly arrived in the future to discover that the MLA has announced the proper citation for a Tweet.

— Adam B. Golub (@adamgolub) August 7, 2013

Y'all, it's not actually Shark Week. Discovery made that up. It's not like Thanksgiving. Nobody else needs to note it.

— Linda Holmes (@nprmonkeysee) August 7, 2013

Just a reminder: The Comeback was the best show ever made.

— Leslie Grossman (@MissLeslieG) August 7, 2013

FXX's afternoon schedule of Sports Night/Arrested Development/HIMYM/Parks is Stuff White People Like as a TV channel.

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) August 7, 2013
